LanguageData.TeachingSpot.label: Teacher Table
LanguageData.TeachingSpot.description: Designates a spot where lessons will be held.
LanguageData.GlobeCL.label: RimWorld Globe
LanguageData.GlobeCL.description: Putting this globe on a classroom will improve the effectiveness of teaching.
LanguageData.ChalkboardCL.label: Chalkboard
LanguageData.ChalkboardCL.description: Putting this chalkboard on a classroom will improve the effectiveness of teaching.
LanguageData.BallotBox.label: Ballot Box
LanguageData.BallotBox.description: Elections will take place around this box. Build it on a safe, preferably indoor spot.
